comment: : City Hall is currently in lock-down. Please avoid the area.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / lock-down-05

            :time (c / current))
      :snt2 (a / avoid-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (a2 / area)))
